alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County South Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 14 at 10:04PM PST until December 15 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, Temperatures as low as 31 in wind sheltered areas will result in frost formation. For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 10 to 20 mph. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County South Coast. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 3 AM PST Wednesday. For the Frost Advisory, from 3 AM to 9 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
